attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the immigration system should be looked into more... to stop this country being taken over by them  i saw in the paper that a person that served in the forces in ww2 who earnt the VC a ghurka not allowed to settle in the UK i think this is unfair and unjust he should have more right than these others

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
